DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) effective treatment tinnitus .
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Effect Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulaton Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: Subjective tinnitus Age 18 year old Meniere , conductive hearing loss , objective tinnitus History seizure disorder epilepsy Clinically relevant psychiatric comorbidity Previous symptomatic stroke Surgically traumatically implant foreign body pacemaker , implanted medication pump , metal plate skull , metal inside skull eye ( dental appliance filling ) , intracardiac line may pose physical hazard magnetic stimulation
